title: Kaathaga Vantha Ponnu Lyrics Idhu Namma Aalu
stanzas: <div>Kaathaga Vantha Ponnu Lyrics Idhu Namma Aalu

Ayyo Kaaathaaga vandha ponnu
moochukkulla serndhaale
moochaaga ulla vandhu
manasukulla poondhaale

Kaaathaaga vandha ponnu
moochukkulla serndhaale
moochaaga ulla vandhu
manasukulla poondhaale

solla solla ketkaama
ullukulla ponaale
kathalennum peraala
tholla panna poraale

mudiyalaiye mudiyalaiye
unma solla mudiyalaiye
theriyalaiye theriyalaiye
poiyum solla theriyalaiye

nadu raathiri iva
veliya vandhaakkaa
sooriyan etti paakkuthu

mudiyalaiye mudiyalaiye
unma solla mudiyalaiye
theriyalaiye theriyalaiye
poiyum solla theriyalaiye

Kaaathaaga vandha ponnu
moochukkulla serndhaale
moochaaga ulla vandhu
manasukulla poondhaale
